content.rendered:
[ PERFECT CONDITION ] Year 2017 Reg 2019
Odometer: 7,XXX KM
Open price : 5.325M OTR ( Open For Negotiation )
Colour : vermillion red on apex red interrior
Engine : 3,800cc 562HP V8 twin turbo
– 7speed automatic 0-100km/h 2,7sec
– 7inch touch screen
– Usb port/bluetooth audio 8 speakers surround
– Automatic climate control
– Memory seat / electric seat
– Front lifter adjustment
– Rear camera / parking sensor
– Mclaren ceramic brakes
– Tire pirelli p zero
– Interrior Alanctara
– Tax ON / never been crash / flooding
Perfect condition & Very well maintained

This is the newest stock update of Prestige Image Motorcars
